name: Chales Anguish
death_place: Cape of Good Hope, British controlled Cape ColonyThe Cape of Good Hope was controlled by the Dutch East India Company from 1652 as the Dutch Cape Colony. During the French Revolutionary Wars it was invaded by the British in 1795 who controlled it until 1803 when it was ceded to the Batavian Republic before being invaded again by the British in 1806, after which the British controlled Cape Colony was established.
